website_summaries.verdict: A solid little dump truck with thick wheels that works for little kids, but will still keep their interest as they grow.
pros: Solid construction like all Green Toys
Rugged and basic looking dump truck
The dump truck also comes in a combination red and yellow and a combination blue and orange color scheme
Can be put in the dishwasher to clean
Dump portion is easy to lift
cons: Double check the measurements on this truck before you buy
It may be smaller than you are expecting

customer_reviews.title: Its big! Great for your little one.
customer_reviews.text: I hope for a world with less plastic waste and smart product packaging. This toy is wonderful, nice quality, detailed, made from old milk jugs. My son enjoys it alot, I like that I made the investment to help reduce some of the trash in the world. The packaging is a plain box with text. No plastic wrap, tape, twist ties, zip ties, intense marketing stickers or photos. Box went into the recycling bin. When the toy is done it will get handed down or recycled again.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The quality is unbeatable, like all other Green Toy products we've purchased. Our little guy just turned one and loves pushing it around the house. It is very easy to rinse off or wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mumsy

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite toy and going strong
customer_reviews.text: This is my 17-month-old son's favorite toy and has been for several months. He discovered it at daycare and his teachers asked me if he had one at home because of how much he plays with it. I hesitated to buy it because I thought he would lose interest in it at school--quite the opposite. He loves it and pushes it around our house and yard. "Gruck" now goes everywhere with us from parties to the beach. Other kids jump in and want to push it around too. I think the lip of the dumping bin on the truck gives it a good handle for pushing. I would highly recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Nice truck, but not well suited for sand
customer_reviews.text: I usually like Green Toys, but I am not a fan of this Dump Truck. I bought it for our little one to play in the sand, but the wheels are clearly not ideal for sand. They hardly turn at all, since the wheels are too smooth. It's a fine enough toy if used outside the sand box, but our little one hardly plays with it in the sand box and sticks to other vehicles that actually drive in sand.
customer_reviews.author: manny

customer_reviews.title: Our son has loved this truck since he got it almost a year ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son has loved this truck since he got it almost a year ago for his birthday. He quickly figured out walking with it. Biggest downside he struggled with is the dumper back flips up super easy so he had to figure out how to avoid that. He did so by either pushing it backwards or putting his hands up in the "crease/curve" of the dumper bed near the front. Still loves playing with it and so does his big sister. All plastic, no metal, no sharp parts. Haven't put it in the dishwasher yet - only been inside so far.
customer_reviews.author: MHall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect classic toy
customer_reviews.text: My 13-month old son loves this toy truck. It is sturdy and the recycled plastic has a pleasant subtle texture. He plays with a bunch of Green Toys at Daycare so I already knew I liked the feel and simplicity of them before I bought him this truck. The truck comes in super simple cardboard packaging (no blister packaging or obnoxious plastic ties). I was pleased with everything about this simple but, for babies, fascinating toy.
customer_reviews.author: K L

customer_reviews.title: Love this truck!
customer_reviews.text: Very excited to try toys that are chemical free and made here in America from recycled material!!!! My little one is only 3 and a half months old so he's a bit young but since I bought the My first stacker at the same time it works well together! He is thrilled when i put the pieces in the back of the truck and dump them out! He has two older siblings and they love playing with these with him. I couldn't be happier to have bought these! If my review has helped you please hit the yes and or helpful button! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Cute

customer_reviews.title: Adorable & Durable
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered this toy at our local library during storytime. They had a fire truck, school bus, and dump truck. ALL the children were immediately drawn to them. Since the pandemic hit, we’ve been unable to visit the library. I figured I’d get my little buddy a piece of the magic he’s lost. I purchased the fire truck and the dump truck. They hold up very well to a 2/3 year old and all their antics.
customer_reviews.author: ~ Luvs2ShopAlot ~

customer_reviews.title: Great old fashioned and safe toy
customer_reviews.text: We like everything about this toy: it is made at human size and feeling; just let the kids use their imagination without metal parts, annoying beeps or batteries. Very friendly. We bought a few toys for land and bath tub use from this company and they are lovely. The fact that they are made with recycled milk bottles is certainly endearing. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Mauro Chiappe

customer_reviews.title: Another great Green Toy product
customer_reviews.text: Green Toy trucks are our favorite for our truck obsessed 20 month old. This one is larger than most in his collection - he puts his other trucks in the back of this one. No sun fading after staying out most of the summer and works great in water and sand. Also , love that it is lightweight if we need to bring it anywhere - no metal parts.
customer_reviews.author: Heather P.

customer_reviews.title: ECO Trucks are made in the 🇺🇸 and from recycled materials.  Win win
customer_reviews.text: I am a homedaycare that operates on a shoestring budget. Due to the Pandemic I was awarded a grant. Everything I have is primarily bought second hand. So when I had the opportunity to get the littles a few new dump trucks, it was exciting. When I looked at the selection, the Eco trucks were made in the 🇺🇸 and were from recycled plastic bottles. The special nature of these dump trucks weren't more expensive that the others. I am very happy with my selection and I also bought two of the car carriers, my littles are happy campers!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Reinhard

customer_reviews.title: One of my grandson's favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it is just a very sturdy, functional rolling toy without flashing lights and noisy sirens. My <2 year old grandson loves it. Rolls well and dumps with no issues. Because we loved this one so much, we also bought the Green Toys Airplane and Car Hauler Truck. The kids love all of them and they are all very well made. They will be around for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Great dump truck for outside
customer_reviews.text: Great dump truck. Like all of the other toys from Green Toys, this a sturdy well made truck. It dumps easily and is large enough to carry a good amount of small toys, sand, dirt, or rocks. It would be a great addition to a sand pit or just as an outside toy. It also gets plenty of use inside. Love that its recycled plastic and completely recyclable.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys ROCKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This dump truck is the perfect size for small children. I've purchased several different toys from Green Toys - all expertly designed and made. They are my favorite toy company not only for their green practices, but for their masterful simplistic designs and very high quality!! This dump truck cold not be more perfect for getting the job done, lol!!
customer_reviews.author: Twila Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this toy for Christmas. In fact, he started playing with it right away!!
customer_reviews.author: Danushka

customer_reviews.title: Best toys ever
customer_reviews.text: The toys are super cute, sturdy and always a hit with my own boys or nephews. Love that they are made out of recycled milk containers, so completely safe for my young nephews to chew on and sturdy enough to last for years - which has been the case with every truck, boat, etc. that my own boys have had and passed down for about a decade.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Made from recycled materials!  Yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little dump truck. Ordered it for my new grandson and I know he will love it when he gets old enough to play with it. I ordered from Green Toys because they are aware of the need to keep our environment clean! I will always order from a company that recycles or uses recycled materials. Thank you Green Toys!
customer_reviews.author: The Duncan Family

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what the recipient’s mom thought of this because she never bothered to send a thank you note (hmm), but I think it is a cool toy. Kids love dump trucks! I like the big shapes and the slightly “soft” feel of the eco-plastic (nicer on little hands than the shiny, hard plastic you see elsewhere). This should work in a kid’s toy rotation for a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Criticalthinker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and a toddler favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these and they are absolutely indestructible! My two toddlers play with them daily and I don’t foresee them outgrowing them anytime soon. One of my children is particularly rough on toys and this dump truck looks brand new after almost three years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a great truck that it keeps getting stolen :(
customer_reviews.text: This is the truck that all the toddlers gravitate toward at the park. No, they will not play with the other toys that we offer to share. They fight over this one. We've had this stolen--or accidentally taken, from other families. It's a great truck and I've had to buy it 3 times, because my toddler son loves it so much. Just keep an eye on it at the playground.
customer_reviews.author: KTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 18-month-old nephew, and he was drawn to it right away. Came out of the box very easily (not held in by anything at all) and the very first thing he did, before anyone even noticed, was put it on the floor and completely stand on it. Ha ha. To my surprise, it didn't seem to mind at all. It may be plastic, but it's impressively durable. It's definitely going to stand up to some banging and dropping. His three-year-old sister found it mildly interesting and his five-year-old brother couldn't have cared less (he has much more detailed and advanced trucks). But for the 1- to 2-year-old range I think it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D.

customer_reviews.title: Rugged little truck
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toy. This little truck is very well built. It is made entirely of plastic except the two axles. This is the only toy truck I have bought for my son that is still in "like new condition" after a year of being played with. There are no parts that can break. The wheels and tires do not come off. It is a rugged little truck. I like the fact that it is not metal like some other options out there and all the edges are rounded off to prevent injury if a child falls on it. Great design. I have bought and will continue to buy more Green Toys... I highly recommend this truck and their other toys.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy dump truck
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dump truck for my son to play with in the dirt outside. The best part is, you can throw this thing in the dishwasher to clean it. I love that Green Toys are made in the USA and from recycled materials.This dump truck is very sturdy and well built. I will definitely purchase more Green Toys in the future.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lingerfelt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and company
customer_reviews.text: Love this company and this truck. Purchased this for my husband to play with our five month old son. My husband was super excited. Our son is a little too young for it now, but he loves watching Daddy drive it around the floor over the rug and load toys into it and dump them. I know he will enjoy doing the same when he's older. Plus my husband loves that we are supporting a company made in the USA and using recycled products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware!! Not eligible for return!! I wanted big dump truck toddler could push around. This is a sturdy but small truck for beach or sandbox. I would order other products from this company but not if I can't return a product that's a wrong fit.
customer_reviews.author: JES

customer_reviews.title: Boring toy
customer_reviews.text: It is well made. But my little one is not so interested. It serves as a good dump truck model but may be a boring toy. Cannot move much with wheels. I bought another remote controlled construction truck and he seems to be more interested.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought for the price, but that’s on me! I still really liked the colors and this manufacturer. I used these for a favor holder (and gift to the baby) for a construction themed baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: alliereidsmith

customer_reviews.title: Very well Made
customer_reviews.text: Green Toys are great for kids , we own quite a few of them and their durability is amazing, my grandkids are rough on them and they have held up very well. Plus they are made in the US out of recycled materials. I highly recommend their products.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Dump Trick!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson enjoyed this truck at his playgroup, so I bought him his own. He enjoys it and other children like to share it at the local sandbox. Toddler crowd approved...and very sturdy. No motor to break. No batteries to replace. Powered by child.
customer_reviews.author: Fran S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second product we have gotten from this company and have been pleased with both. The quality is excellent and the kids love it. The size is great because they can actually put cars or toys in the back.
customer_reviews.author: REG

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old toddler who loves trucks! He is a fan of all things wheels, especially dump trucks! This one is very sturdy, well made, and aesthetically pleasing! He enjoys this toy very much!
customer_reviews.author: Wandering Self

customer_reviews.title: Solid dump truck
customer_reviews.text: This dump truck is a solid choice for hours of play and enioyment. Its durable and hold up to rough aggressive play without breaking. Kids love it, and find lots of creative things ti do with it.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.H.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a piece of junk toy truck before this that my kids destroyed almost immediately. I thought it would be best to buy something double the price that would last. This did. This one is study and high quality, plus seems like a great company that made it.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a toddler obsessed with dump trucks.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very chunky truck with bold colors and pronounced features. Great for a little guy who loves dump trucks. My son can’t get enough of playing with this one. It rolls easily and seems pretty durable. He loves putting blocks and other toys into the hopper and dumping them out. He got my money’s worth out of it after the first couple days—and he is still coming back for more.
customer_reviews.author: W. Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my Grandsons as it was on sale. It’s built very well and safe for younger children to play with. I can’t wait to visit so I can play with this dump truck with them. I am a big fan of Green Toys!
customer_reviews.author: Mare1949

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Safe Toy
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old grandson loves it. He puts other small toys in the dump part and drives them around until he finds a place to back up and dump the load. It is very sturdy and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Jalapeño 023

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 18 month old nephew who just loves trucks. It's an extremely sturdy little toy that I don't feel that he will be able to break into a million pieces. Love that it's made from recycled milk bottles, especially since my nephew's parents are extremely eco-friendly vegans. They were extremely impressed with it as well. Definitely recommend these products. Can't beat American made!
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys are always worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Can I just say that Green Toys are without a doubt the most durable, reliable toys in the market? Without a doubt. My son’s bigger version of this toy was received for Christmas, 2017 and has take a full year of just absolute abuse and is still in perfect working order. It is his favorite toy, and this one is a wonderful addition.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys Rock!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a lot of different toys form this company. My grandsons love every one. They play extra hard with everything. They have broken a lot of the stuff that was made in China. But not these. Not even a scratch. I will be able to pass them to other kids when they outgrow them.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Big truck for lots of dumping
customer_reviews.text: We had been waiting for the price on this brand to go down. We bought this to be used in the sand, but have not actually taken it outside as of yet. Our son fills it with lego bricks, or cars, or small plush toys and drives them all over the house. This has become his favorite dump truck. It fills easily and holds a good amount. The dumping is better than many trucks as all of the stuff in the back can be dumped. We are glad we purchased it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa Mama

customer_reviews.title: so I was disappointed when I received it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read how big this was , so I was disappointed when I received it, but that was my fault ,it seams pretty sturdy,this is a Christmas gift, so I don't know how it'll go, I wanted a larger size like I've seen in the stores, I'm sure my grandson will like it though, I just hope it holds up with him, he's a mighty might, it is pretty thick
customer_reviews.author: splurge

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am working on purchasing every toy/vehicle Green Toys makes. They are so sturdy and well made. My granddaughter loves the trucks and cars. She fills the dump truck and then fills it again. Such fun. She has also dropped them on the cement with no issues to the product. Truly well made
customer_reviews.author: Cr C

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys are where it's at
customer_reviews.text: Never, ever, not even ONCE have I been disappointed about a single Green Toy I have purchased. Hands down the most reliable brand to order. I get them for gifts and for my own son. They hold up GREAT even with little boys who are ROUGH on their toys.
customer_reviews.author: Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: KIDS LOVED THEM
customer_reviews.text: My 2 grandsons, aged 2 and 4, loved these. I got one for each, and it was age appropriate for both of them. Very sturdy, and can be kept outside on the patio for outdoor play.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes yes yes. Great toy. Very well made. Durable and sturdy. Easy to clean after a good time on a dirt pile. Hours of fun by my 2 yr old. Nice vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Children's Toy Line
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased dozens of Green Toys for my grandchildren and other friends. I love how sturdy and cute they are! They are very reasonably priced and you can always find a lightning deal or sale on them. This is by far my favorite toy line right now! And I'm a total toy snob!
customer_reviews.author: April Cline Jones

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 4 grandchildren (ages 8,6,4 & 3) as an Easter gift. They play with it all the time in the sandbox and it has held up very well. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this great little truck for my grandson. It's just the right size, appears to be very well made and I'm sure will get lots of use. I will be purchasing other toys made by this company.
customer_reviews.author: gw

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My son is 13 months old and I gave him the truck on his 1 year birthday. Ever since it is his favorite toy, plays with it every day multiple times a day, makes truck sounds, loads it and unloads it. It is a very good size and seems to be very well made and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Pear Charles

customer_reviews.title: Rolls down wood floors now!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this for my nephew's first bday, it was a big hit! And from previous viewers troubles they have fixed the wheels rolling on wood floors. I took the truck out soon as I got it to make sure I didn't have to do anything to the wheels before I had to wrap it up; I was so excited when it rolled down my wood floor hallway :). The dump truck is cute, rugged, built in the great old USA, and made out of bottles how better can this gift get !
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his truck!
customer_reviews.text: When your toddler is amazed by the trucks, it’s time to buy him one. He’s so in love with this truck. He throws everything in it and pushes it around! We will take it to the beach soon.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Avi

customer_reviews.title: Durable, well made truck
customer_reviews.text: I love green toys. They are great quality and wonderfully made. We have owned this truck over 6 months now and all the parts still work perfectly. The reason it gets four stars is my daughter has not taken to this toy like she has with her other green toys (stacking cups, bath tub boat). However, other toddlers that visit our house love this truck! So I definitely recommend for all the transportation or truck loving kids. It is well worth the money. It is own of those toys that will be passed down from kid to kid and still look new in 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: This truck is sturdy and well-made. It's wide enough for little hands to manoeuvre well as they load knickknacks in the back. My toddler is very happy with the purchase. It's always a good feeling when you get value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for rough play
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this truck and plays with it all the time. It is great at taking all the abuse he can dish out, and if it gets left outside there is no worry that it will rust. Cleaning it after a jaunt in the mud and sand is as simple as spraying it with the garden hose, and it is fit to come right back into the house for a less dirty session of play. I highly recommend this truck and have been happy with all the green toys that we've bought including the school bus, submarine, sea plane, and tug boat. I think the fire truck and tractor may be in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our Green Toy Collection
customer_reviews.text: This is our 6th purchase from this company. I love the premise behind how this toy is made and I love supporting a local company (San Francisco). We own 2 cars, fire truck, school bus and garbage truck prior to adding the dump truck to our collection. The toys are well made, durable, fun and easy to clean. Considering the beating some of these toys take from my 2 year old son they hold up amazingly well. You will not be disappointed. I highly recommend any of the products from Green Toys.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Gootsie

customer_reviews.title: Nice truck.
customer_reviews.text: This truck sure takes a beating at our house, and it looks as new as the day I bought it. Made out of some pretty sturdy material. The kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Christian

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great toy. Not only do we feel good about ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great toy. Not only do we feel good about purchasing toys made in the USA, they are also 100% made from recycled plastic! The toy itself is really neat because it has a lot of moving parts. The wheels move and the dump container on the back hinges back and forth. The truck is sturdy and holds up well to my child well. I will definitely be purchasing more of these for my child in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little truck
customer_reviews.text: This little truck was a perfect gift for my 1 year old daughter. She loves to put things in the back and take them out. I like that it's made from recycled plastic, and seems to be well made. Would have given it 5 stars if it rolled just a bit smoother- it doesn't go very far when you push it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful toy!
customer_reviews.text: Green Toys: exceptional products. Do not hesitate to buy. My grandson plays with them every day and truly enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieB

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and safe toy truck
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves his sizable, sturdy and safe toy truck. He is obsessed with it and it is just large enough for him to add loads, such as his kiddy tablet. He likes to grab hold of the sides to " drive" it as well. Wonderful toy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A kid's best friend.
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this dump truck toy and pushes it around our whole house/neighborhood. It's a great size for toddlers. Durable, love that it's made from recycled material.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: I am totally in love with Green Toy toys and this is no exception. It is sturdy and good for indoor or outdoor play. No sharp edges makes this a good truck for any age.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite truck for 2 year old toddler
customer_reviews.text: If your toddler likes trucks he'll love this one. It's well built and I'm not sure why there are some complaints about the wheels not rolling on hardwood or that the wheels fall off. Our toddler is very rough with this truck and the wheels still roll fine! He actually likes to put all his weight on the truck and push it along the ground. He does that from the park back to our house which is like a quarter of a mile!
customer_reviews.author: Hoppaguy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toy for my grandson worth every penny and priced excellent, very sturdy and durable...great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Heaton

customer_reviews.title: Study truck
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Birthday gift to a one year old and he loves it. Big and sturdy to take hard toddler play.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri1658

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle for little hands. My grandson likes to put balls in and dump. Durable but easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jill myers

customer_reviews.title: Simple, non-toxic and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Simple dump truck but it is super sturdy, and 2 years later still a hit in the sandbox area outside. I like that these toys are non-toxic plastic (recycled from milk jugs) and can go in the dish washer if needed (easy to clean in general).
customer_reviews.author: abadak987

customer_reviews.title: Eco-friendly
customer_reviews.text: These toys are AWESOME. A lot larger than I expected. These are gifts for my little great nephews. I know they are going to L💚VE them!
customer_reviews.author: gwen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this truck but I think the back part falls back too easily. It just falls whenever my kids try to push it.
customer_reviews.author: Yuririn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trucks for little boys
customer_reviews.text: These trucks are great! They sturdy and colorful. Big fun trucks. My grandkids love them..:)
customer_reviews.author: Pamelia S. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Love this dump truck!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. Our absolute favorite feature is that you can put the entire truck in the dishwasher! Our little one totes this to the park and spends hours filling it with dirt and mud. At the end of the week, it gets a nice hot wash and comes up all clean. A simple toy with good design from an ethical company in the USA. The truck is big, and very well made. The earth loves that its eco-friendly (made of recycled milk jugs!, I love that its dishwasher safe, and my little one loves that it holds several pine cones at once. A win-win for all of us.
customer_reviews.author: sassymom

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, my kid loves it.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my baby's first birthday. He didn't really start playing with it until he was 14 months old or so. Now, it's his favorite toy! He loads it up, dumps it back out, and pushes it all around the house. The wheels work well on our linoleum kitchen floor and the old school shag carpet in the living room. Awesome value.
customer_reviews.author: K. A.T.

customer_reviews.title: A Big Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this truck. A Big Hit - it is well made and great colors. Parents approved!
customer_reviews.author: Botanical Bounty

customer_reviews.title: Great toy - love these products.
customer_reviews.text: Green toys are the best my son loves both his bus and truck and is always playing with them. Also very durable - they have been dropped, thrown, stepped on and still look like new. Also packaging in minimal so doesn’t feel like a lot of waste like some kids toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Truckin
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the picture. I can't wait for my cousin to open on his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this truck as does my son. He is VERY rough on his cars/trucks and this brand in general takes a beating. Be prepared they are VERY simple designs. When they first arrived they (I got the firetruck too) I was worried they were cheap. But, this truck has withstood a year and a half of rough play and I am sure will be fine for our next son due to arrive in a few months. My son actually uses this truck to haul around his other smaller cars. He loves it. Its also easy to clean, just wipe up.
customer_reviews.author: jtill

customer_reviews.title: I wish more kids' toys were like this one.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for a toddler. Very old-school. No bells, whistles, noises, flashing lights, batteries or the rest of the hoopla. It's a cool dump truck. Sturdy, easy to roll around, and the back portion lifts up just as it should. The kids use their imaginations, providing their own engine sounds as they play with it. A very popular toy that spends little time on the shelf. I wish more kids' toys were like this one.
customer_reviews.author: cookie cutter

customer_reviews.title: Cool truck
customer_reviews.text: This truck is pretty cool. It doesn’t make any noise or anything but my son still loves to play with it. It is as promised in pictures and detail.
customer_reviews.author: Felish T

customer_reviews.title: Very nice truck
customer_reviews.text: I've been really impressed with all of the toys made by Green Toys, and this truck is one of my toddler's favorites. It's very well made, so I think it'll be with us for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: These toys are great!
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of these toys and my son absolutely loves them all. They are simple, but sure keep him entertained (even with no lights or noises). Very durable even despite being loaded with rocks and dirt multiple times!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy , great for outdoor play
customer_reviews.text: The perfect dump truck for my 4 yr old grandson. Very sturdy! Great for sandbox and out door play
customer_reviews.author: Betty Moore

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it, can't complain
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old son loves it. The size of it makes it difficult to transport so he tends to opt for a smaller green toys dump truck, but I expect him to gravitate back once he gets bigger. A bit pricey at retail, but definitely worth it at a sale price.
customer_reviews.author: ffej101

customer_reviews.title: The best part is it is made from recyclable items!
customer_reviews.text: Had to get this truck to go with his first recyclable toy plane given as a birthday gift. My son loves the durability of this truck. He’s had it for over two years
customer_reviews.author: YG

customer_reviews.title: great little dump truck
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 22 months old grandson and he immediately had it next to his favorite choo choo toy to partner up. Loved piling everything that would fit into it and rolled it around and around. Would collect things around the house just to add or subtract the load. He was fascinated by the wheels, how the container would move up and down, how it could be pushed back and forth with whomever would stop to play. Lots of giggles and laughter! This is a sturdy, non toxic, delightful toy. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Aiis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands
customer_reviews.text: Great for my one-year-old. They are light-weight, dishwasher safe, and the perfect size. We use them outdoor, indoor, at the beach and the lake, and in the tub. He has gotten a lot of "trucks" for his birthday, but most of them were too little for him to crawl and push. These are clearly his favorites. We have 6-7 of these vehicles now. It is true that they do not roll well on hardwood floors, but they scoot along just fine and it's not like he notices.
customer_reviews.author: E. Talley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT first dump truck!
customer_reviews.text: First off, there is absolutely nothing wrong with the wheels on this truck. Maybe they changed something since the few reviews that talk about problems with them, but it rolls great. My 9-month old is having a blast rolling and dumping things out of this truck. It is built really well. There are no sharp corners, everything is nicely rounded-off, and no places to pinch little fingers. Looks to be really sturdy, I am certain it will last for years. Love that it is made of recycled plastic. I'm having a hard time not purchasing all of the Green Toys trucks!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Green toys are always great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for him for Christmas and they always stand up green toys are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Debra Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: The kids never put it down! I see this truck lasting them year after year!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria.A.13

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Good-quality Toy
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure what to make of this toy. I like the idea of a recycled plastic toy- but a toy has to function as a toy first.I grew up with Tonka and they were rugged toys that I valued for years. I saw these toys and thought I would give them a try. I liked the quality and look of them. I gave it as a gift and the child is quite in love with it. I am strongly considering buying other toys in this line for future gifts.
customer_reviews.author: AK-AK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for Outdoor and Indoor play
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maneuver, plus sturdy and simple for little ones. 3 year old loves it for playing with a variety of other toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: The size, look, and durability of this truck are just right for a toddler. It could even work for a slightly older child.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys products are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the Green Toys products we have. My 3 yr old got this for his birthday and he loves filling it up and dumping random things all over the house
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves this!
customer_reviews.text: It's very good quality and my almost 2-year old grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Pam P

customer_reviews.title: Nice dump truck for young children
customer_reviews.text: Pretty well made. Looks good. My 2 year old grandson however liked the smaller trucks we had.
customer_reviews.author: isgcupczaoks

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase for 2-year old boy
customer_reviews.text: We are delighted with the quality of this truck, purchased for our two-year old grandson's birthday. It's a good feeling to be able to buy a US-manufactured toy also. There is very good customer service with this company too!
customer_reviews.author: La Mancha

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Durable, cute, good sized and I appreciate the safety of ingredients. Will be a reform customer.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them, well made quality items
customer_reviews.text: I adore Green Toys. They’re so well made and very sturdy, not to mention the whole green/recycled aspect to them. We have a lot of different items from this company and my kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and other Green Toys (10 in all) during one of Amazon lightning deal offers. Although I had to pay extra for shipping overseas, we don't regret it one bit. Who knew recycling could be so much fun! These toys are really well constructed - sturdy and can stand a lot of abuse. I hope these stand the test of time (and my two kids 7 and 3).
customer_reviews.author: Abu Yusuf

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best dump truck ever, we take it everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: My LO just turned 1 year old and we bought him a couple of trucks from this line. Firstly, i just love the size compared to my 1 year old. When he was crawling he could push these trucks around with his hands and now that hes walking he can still put 2 hands on them and push them around. They are some of his favorite toys! We play with this truck indoors, outdoors and have even taken it to the beach. This little truck is frickin awesome. I can't wait to get more in this series.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My son is not quite a year yet but loves to push this around and flip the dump part up and down. It has a sturdy feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Anderson

product_meta.title: Green Toys Dump Truck in Yellow and Red - BPA Free, Phthalates Free Play Toys for Gross Motor, Fine Motor Skill Development. Pretend Play
product_meta.description:
Size:Size| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingLet your child learn while playing with the Green Toys Dump Truck. This dumping truck toy is a practical and innovative way to make your child improve their fine and gross motor skills, including the improvement of their pincer grip. This toy from Green Toys does not contain BPA, phthalates or PVC and is safe for earth and child. This dumping truck is a great way of making your child learn about the dumping of garbage, which will help them understand about the necessity of clean surroundings.

AMAZON.COM










DUMP TRUCK

 * Ages: One and up
 * Requires: Ready to play indoors or out


AT A GLANCE:

 * Made in the USA from 100 percent recycled milk jugs
 * Sturdy design features fully functioning dumper and no metal axles
 * Encourages development of gross and fine motor skills
 * Phthalate and BPA free
 * US supply chain reduces greenhouse gas and saves energy
 * Easy to clean--can even go in the dishwasher
 * Accolades: iParenting Outstanding Product award, Oppenheim Best Outdoor Toy, and more






Need help hauling a big load while helping save the planet? The sturdy Green Toys Dump Truck is ready to get working. Made in the USA from 100 percent recycled plastic milk containers, this award-winning, eco-designed toy truck has no metal axles and a workable dumper that encourages motor skill development.

Everything Green Toys Inc. does--from using raw materials to running its California-based manufacturing processes--is geared toward one purpose: making products that are good for the earth and safe and fun for little ones.

MADE IN THE USA
The Green Toys Dump Truck is manufactured entirely in the USA, supporting the domestic economy and our planet.



SAFE PRODUCTS START WITH SAFE MATERIALS
Like all Green Toys products, the Dump Truck is made from 100 percent recycled milk jug plastic. The recycled HDPE (#2 plastic) meets FDA food contact standards and does not contain BPA, phthalates, or PVC.

Green Toys' internal testing regimen often exceeds those mandated by US and international safety standards.



100 PERCENT RECYCLED
From its material selections to its supply chain, Green Toys thinks about how its choices impact our planet. That's why the company uses recycled materials and a very tight local supply chain that help save energy and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. And Green Toys' packaging is made from minimal post-consumer recycled materials with no plastic twist ties or films.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Assembled Dump Truck.







FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Need help hauling a big load while helping save the planet? The Green Toys Dump Truck is ready to get working. Made from 100% recycled plastic milk containers, this really is the most energy efficient vehicle on this or any planet. The super cool eco-design has a workable dumper and no metal axles.

See more
feature_bullets: Safe Toy: green toy dump truck is made using environmental friendly materials and does not contain BPA, phthalates or PVC. The packing of this tea set is done with recycled, recyclable materials, printed with soy inks

Dump Toy Utility: this yellow and red color truck toy is made for improving gross motor and fine motor skills. It will also help them absorb where and how the garbage needs to be dumped for making them learn about keeping the surroundings clean
Package Includes: truck dump toy includes a workable dumper and no metal axles. Make the learning and skill development of your child practical and innovative
Durable Truck Toy: this toy set is made from recycled plastic milk containers. FDA food contact standards ensure durability, strength and safety

Easy Cleaning: clean the dump truck toy using mild baby shampoo or soap. It is dishwasher safe and should be cleaned whenever your child prefers playing with it. Suitable for use in the indoors as well as outdoors
